item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Found the solution to eliminate command window, just add:
pragma Linker_options("-mwindows");
within the main procedure, it will look like a pure Windows application.
I'm going to check in tonight.
item.content:encoded:
Found the solution to eliminate command window, just add:

pragma Linker_options(“-mwindows”);

within the main procedure, it will look like a pure Windows application.

I’m going to check in tonight.

item.description: I forgot to mention - it is a standalone application, or be more precisely, statically linked, so copy over to a Windows box it will just run, no installation, no DLL, no configuration, no registry.
